meanings.definition: The quality or state of being painful.
meanings.sent1: The painfulness of the injury made him wince.
meanings.sent2: The doctor asked about the painfulness of the patient's symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The painfulness of the situation was evident in her furrowed brow.
meanings.sent4: The painfulness of the truth hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The painfulness of the memory lingered long after the event.

meanings.definition: The capacity to cause physical or emotional pain.
meanings.sent1: The painfulness of the medicine's side effects was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The painfulness of his words left her feeling hurt.
meanings.sent3: The painfulness of the joke made them all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The painfulness of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The painfulness of the breakup was like a dark cloud over her heart.
